title: Chat App website
description: This is a homepage design and build for a concept project – a chat application. I have designed the page first then later built a responsive page in Webflow.

title: Team website
description: A full website design and build for a concept team collaboration platform. This website also includes a beautiful blog. I have built the website and the blog in Webflow which has one of the best CMS for blog hosting.

title: Winery website
description: This is a homepage design and build for a concept project – Louis Eschenauer Winery. This is how a gastronomy brand homepage could look like.

title: Mood Booster App
description: Mental health caring application which includes journaling, different kinds of mood boosters and the emergency help center.
